name: @cardano-foundation/cardano-connect-with-wallet
description: This package aims to provide useful plain js and React.js libs, hooks and components to simplify the cardano dapp integration

scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:react && npm run bundle:core
scripts.bundle:html: uglifyjs -c -m -o html/cardano-connect.min.js -- html/cardano-connect.js && minify html/cardano-connect.css > html/cardano-connect.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build:react && npm run build:core
scripts.publish: npm run publish:react && npm run publish:core
